title: Von Thunen land use around cities

content.question: Which of the following developments is predicted by the von Thünen model of land use around cities?

choices.label: Large-scale growing of flowers and vegetables in the Netherlands
Extensive cattle raising in northern France
Very large dairy farms in Utah and southern Idaho

content.answer: Large-scale growing of flowers and vegetables in the Netherlands

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
